message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product I think you'll find very valuable.  Given its potential benefits, I'm initially offering it at $11,000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.

I appreciate your interest, Bob. While $9,000 is a tempting offer, the value this product brings is considerably higher. I'm willing to come down a bit to $10,500. I believe this price point reflects a fair compromise.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice, but $10,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $9,000 and $10,500, so I'll offer $9,750. I'm hoping we can find a mutually agreeable price.
